title: of the Social Welfare Act 2021 (No. 44 of 2021) shall come into operation.
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Social Welfare Act 2021 (Section 24)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Social Welfare Act 2021 (Section 24) 

(Commencement) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited social welfare act 2021 (section 24) (commencement) order 2021

title: of the Social Welfare Act 2021 (No. 44 of 2021) shall come into operation.
heading: 2. The 1st day of January 2022 is appointed as the day on which section 24
text_raw:
2. The 1st day of January 2022 is appointed as the day on which section 24 

of the Social Welfare Act 2021 (No. 44 of 2021) shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

21 December, 2021. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 4th January, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [750] 3
